body: I still wish my wife had let me take nude pictures of her when she was pregnant; she was that freaking gorgeous.  Our only regret was that we didn't fuck. Prior miscarriages made us both gunshy about that, though we had a HELL of a lot of fun otherwise. Sraddling your wife, while fucking her newly massive tits as she sucks you off as you reach back to finger her clit to orgasm while you're in contact with the life inside her that's your child ...beats a lot of things on whatever your bucket list might be, heh.

Nice!! Never underestimate how amazingly sexy a pregnant woman can be! I never saw the attraction until my wife got pregnant. Pregnant sex varies from woman to woman, but as a general rule, the first trimester is mostly a no go, especially if she has morning sickness and nausea. But then that "glow" arrives in the 2nd trimester, even when she doesn't look pregnant yet, the flip can be switched and a lot of fun can take place...or her switch might be off for the rest of the pregnancy; you just don't know.  And then comes the 3rd trimester, and she can still have that flip switched, or it be dialed down or off...or even turned up. However, she'll be dealing with all the issues that take place as she gets bigger and bigger. Ah, I'm getting nostalgic about it! The wife was so gorgeous, with zero stretch marks (which is something beyond her control ), and the titty fairy had transformed her from borderline B-C cup, to DD cup.
And till to this day he still does not know the answer.
That and how did he even screw mom afterward ? Keep convincing her to get drunk ?

@ayy lmao1 Actually I think thats how it's suppose to be, the impregnation tag is for when their impregnated and a pregnant stomach is shown at the end pages but no sex involved, pregnant tag should be for when there is a sex scene with a pregnant stomach or at least that they are confirmed pregnant. But often times tags are just slapped on a bit all over the place. Like there is already ffm threesome and mmf threesome tags in that case I find the group tag to be a bit weird to add since there are already specific tags for threesomes.

Would be great to only have stuff like this tagged as "pregnant". Most pregnant doujinshi only features a pregnant woman on the last page without her getting fucked in that state.
Or just another tag which helps finding these.
